participants.committee_id: ~{"name": "Appropriations - S/C on Articles I, IV & V"}

agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Appropriations - S/C on Articles I, IV & V TIME & DATE: 7:30 AM, Thursday, February 14, 2019 PLACE: E2.030 CHAIR: Rep. Oscar Longoria The subcommittee on Articles I, IV, and V will meet to hear testimony on House Budget recommendations for the following agencies: · Texas Military Department · Overview of the Criminal Justice Data Reports · Juvenile Justice Department · Department of Criminal Justice · Board of Pardons and Paroles · Texas Commission on Fire Protection · Texas Commission on Jail Standards · Texas Commission on Law Enforcement · Texas Alcoholic Beverage Commission · Texas Department of Public Safety · Texas Division of Emergency Management · Special Provisions Relating to Public Safety and Criminal Justice Agencies Public testimony will be taken and may be limited to five minutes. Agenda items not considered during this hearing may be carried over to a future schedule. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
